Run all LR Downstream analysis

Source: R/generate_report.R
generate_report.Rd

This function loads the single conditions LR outputs and return the LR network based analysis. It assumes that the table present the following columns Ligand, Ligand.Cluster, Receptor,Receptor.Cluster and MeanLR/another measure

generate_report(
  lrpaths,
  genes = NULL,
  out_path,
  sep = ",",
  threshold = 0,
  colors = NULL,
  out_file = NULL,
  report = TRUE,
  output_fmt = "html_document"
)

Arguments

lrpaths

Paths of single condition LR data
genes

list of genes to be considered in the sankey plots
out_path

output directory path
sep

character used on csv
threshold

percentage of edges to be pruned
colors

celltypes colorscheme
out_file

output file names
report

decide if a report is generated or not
output_fmt

rmarkdown render output format parameter

Value

Rmarkdown report all objects from each step

Examples

paths <- c('CTR' = system.file("extdata",
                              "ctr_nils_bm_human.csv",
                              package = "CrossTalkeR"),
          'EXP' = system.file("extdata",
                              "exp_nils_bm_human.csv",
                              package = "CrossTalkeR"))
output =  system.file("extdata", package = "CrossTalkeR")
genes <- c('TGFB1')
data <- generate_report(lrpaths = paths,
                       genes = genes,
                       out_path = paste0(output,'/'),
                       threshold = 0,
                         out_file = "report.html")
